name: Revol Snax
description: Revol Snax is a one-week project. The objective was simple: to promote the project from the Kickstarter website and make it attractive. The second objective was to create an efficient and simple purchasing process for the general public.

other.content: For the purchase process I really wanted to keep the design simple because I adapted to the brand's target audience. But I also tried to make it as attractive as possible while reassuring the user as much as possible, which is one of the most important things in a purchasing process.
See The Unmatched Beauty Of The Great

As in the purchasing process, we must reassure the user about the quality of our product and its reliability. That's why I tried to highlight the product and its features in order to create the purchase.
